hero.title: Annas Abdulloh
hero.typedText: I'm a Web Development Enthusiast, Full-stack Web Developer, UI/UX Designer, Freelancer, Open-source Contributor, Competitive Programmer

about.intro: Hello! 👋 I'm a developer and web designer with a passion for staying at the forefront of information technology. My skill set encompasses web design, development, and user interface creation. I'm enthusiastic about contributing to projects or teams that prioritize innovation.

facts.intro: These are few of my achievements, in the course of my learning. I wish to learn more and more in the days to come.

skills.intro: These are a list of few of my best skills and their evaluations based on the degree of knowledge, I possess in them. I have evaluated them through a careful analysis of my average performances in these domains over time.

resume.sectionIntro: This is a formal demonstration of my education, skills, participations, and experiences. All the processes are listed chronologically.

projects.sectionIntro: A formal collection of some of my best projects. You may have a look before your go.

projectList.title: SIRS (Hospital Information System) Nutrition Clinic of PKU Muhammadiyah Gamping
projectList.description: SIRS (Hospital Information System) Nutrition Clinic of PKU Muhammadiyah Gamping is a project of an information system aimed at monitoring cases of malnutrition at the Nutrition Clinic of PKU Muhammadiyah Gamping Hospital. This project is created as part of a major assignment in the Hospital Information System course.

projectList.title: BackOffice MedUNNES
projectList.description: BackOffice MedUNNES is a web-based telemedicine service administration system used as a platform for the practice of medical students at the Faculty of Medicine, Universitas Negeri Semarang.

projectList.title: Pediatric Nutrition Medical Record Information System (SIPGIZI): Enhancing Nutritional Care for Toddlers
projectList.description: SIPGIZI Balita is a Medical Record Information System specifically designed for the Nutrition Clinic in hospitals. This system allows detailed and systematic recording of the nutritional development of toddlers.

projectList.title: Budget Information System
projectList.description: SIMAKU is a Financial and Accounting Information System, a system used to design the Vision of the University/Unit, Mission of the University/Unit, Goals of the University/Unit, University Strategic Objectives, Key Indicators/Quality Targets of the University/Unit, Program Plans, Budgets, and Expenditures.

projectList.title: DISSEMINATION CERTIFIED INDEPENDENT STUDY Fullstack Web Developer
projectList.description: My Web-based presentations be created using the Bootstrap framework, which offers a wide range of UI components, responsive CSS styles, and pre-built JavaScript functions.

projectList.title: E-TICKET FLIGHT MYAIRFARE
projectList.description: This application/platform is designed to facilitate the search for airplane tickets, flight schedules, and booking both one-way and round-trip flights. It can be accessed through both mobile phones and desktop devices.

contact.sectionIntro: Connecting is always a better way to get the work done. Feel free to connect with me through any of my social media links or drop any remarks in the message box below. I will reply to you as fast as possible.

messages.sentMessage: Your message has been sent. Thank you!

contact.moreInfo: Response to your messages will be made within 6 hrs of submission.
